amendment.description: To establish a renewable electricity standard, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 77, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 44.

action.text: Amendment SA 77 proposed by Senator Udall. (consideration: CR S575) To establish a renewable electricity standard, and for other purposes.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 77, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 44.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 77, under the order of 1/28/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 44.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 77 proposed by Senator Udall.
